title: ParentDetailsConfig
description: Configuration regarding the parent entry of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the parent of the group in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

asLink.description: Show parent as link to to the parent entry. @default false

shortParent.description: If false the parent of the group will be shown as the full distinguishedName, else only the CN is shown. @default false
